scanColonOperator

private static TokenType scanColonOperator(Scanner scanner,
                                           StringBuilder value)
                                    throws SyntaxException,
                                           IOException
Scans all operators beginning with ':' character. Colon operators are: ':' and ':=='.

Parameters:
scanner - Scanner to get characters from.
value - Operator token as string.
Returns:
Return type of token.
Throws:
SyntaxException - On syntax errors.
IOException - On input stream IO errors.

scanDotOperator

private static TokenType scanDotOperator(Scanner scanner,
                                         StringBuilder value)
                                  throws IOException
Scans all operators beginning with .:' character. Colon operators are: '.' and '..'.

Parameters:
scanner - Scanner to get characters from.
value - Operator token as string.
Returns:
Return type of token.
Throws:
IOException - On input stream IO errors.
